data.persona: I am a poor farmer in a very rural area. I don't have many possessions and I only know a few people. I am uneducated and know little about the world outside my small village.
data.description:
You are in the Town square.
In the center of this area is a water well where locals use to get their supply of water.  Surrounding this section are merchants who sell clothes, weapons, armor, and food.  The buildings are typical Northern European construction with narrow alleys in between.
There's a building, a weapon, a food, an armor, a cloth, and a gallows here.
The child is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the child into the building
data.mid_motivation: I want to protect the child from the heavy rain today
data.long_motivation: I hope to train the child to become a good farmer
